28.48.text: Hello. There are eight places in the quarter-final stage of this

32.24.text: competition, and six of them have already been taken.

35.08.text: The seventh will go to whichever team wins tonight.

38.00.text: But for the losers, it's the final curtain.

40.88.text: The team from Nottingham University won their first round match, albeit

44.52.text: in a somewhat low-scoring fixture against the University of Swansea,

47.88.text: and at the gong were ahead by 135 points to 110.

51.96.text: They were quick enough on the buzzer though to keep their opponents

55.16.text: away from the bonus questions for a good 15 minutes.

57.64.text: And they knew their stuff on HMS Beagle,

59.72.text: the Book of Proverbs, Mendelssohn, poitin and plum brandy.

63.32.text: With an average age of 23, let's meet the Nottingham team again.

68.60.text: Hi, I'm Michael Alexander from south London, and I'm studying medicine.

73.16.text: Hi, I'm Ben Scrafield from Sheffield,

80.08.text: and I'm studying for an PhD in American Studies.

83.56.text: Hi, I'm Mark Dennis, I'm from Nottinghamshire,

86.20.text: and I'm studying for a PhD in mathematics.

96.60.text: themselves on -10 in the opening minutes of their first round

99.96.text: match against the University of Southampton, but they had the lead by

103.28.text: the halfway point and they were ahead at the gong by 165 points to 135.

108.40.text: Strengths proved to be the valkyries, the Turing machine,

135.20.text: biological natural sciences, and we're all here for the wheel.
